factual: What penalties can a law enforcement officer face if they deliberately inflict bodily harm causing physical disability between 31% and 60%?
scenario_based: A police officer uses excessive force during an arrest, resulting in the victim sustaining a 45% physical disability. What legal consequences might this officer encounter under the relevant provisions?
advice_seeking: If I witness a law enforcement officer committing acts that cause bodily harm and physical disability to someone, what steps should I take to address this situation legally?
